/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. A red truck, vibrant against the muted colors of the surroundings, is seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the urban landscape below. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the sense of depth and perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the frame, looking down at the street.
